tha-ap248:0.3_0: Held trying to subduing the senior monks,
tha-ap248:1.2_0: the great hermit went to the great hermit.
tha-ap248:1.4_0: to the noble ones, upright and poised,
tha-ap248:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap248:2.4_0: This fruit will be the fruit.
tha-ap248:3.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap248:4.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kāsi.
tha-ap248:5.1_0: sixth hundred senior monks with a thousand.
